ComicInfo.Summary:
The war that's so secret, the rest of the Marvel Universe doesn't even remember it!
Amid the chaos Deadpool dons...a new costume?!?!
Plus: our heroes stage a huge attack on the gluttonous GALACTUS!
*Notes:* The cover is a homage of the cover of Marvel Super Heroes Secret Wars #8.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 18:19:09. [CVDB496388]
ComicInfo.Characters: Captain America, Colossus, Cyclops, Deadpool, Doctor Doom, Galactus, Hawkeye, Hulk, Human Torch, Julia Carpenter, Lizard, Magneto, Mr. Fantastic, Nightcrawler, Professor X, Rogue, She-Hulk, Spectrum, Spider-Man, Storm, Thing, Thor, Thunderball, Venom, War Machine, Wasp, Zsaji
ComicInfo.Teams: Avengers, Cosmic Champions, Fantastic Four, Symbiotes, X-Men
